scheme_name: Scheme for Establishment of Backyard Poultry Units under Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana (Haryana)
description: This scheme, under the Mukhya Mantri Antyodaya Parivaar Utthan Yojana, provides financial assistance for backyard poultry units to uplift economically weaker families in Haryana.
key_features: Financial support for backyard poultry units

category_criteria: Open to economically weaker families under Antyodaya Yojana
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Haryana

special_notes: Part of the Antyodaya upliftment program
